description:
ğŸš€ We are looking for an ESG Specialist to lead esolidar ESG strategy, including being the interface with our customers, so they can use our platform to its full potential. Are you ready to do meaningful work that makes an impact?

Who we are
  • Since 2013 esolidar has been on a mission to revolutionize positive impact. Esolidar delivers ESG and CSR management tools to some of the worldâ€™s most exciting companies. We help them do good and measure their actions through our easy-to-use and engaging platform, accessible to everyone, wherever and whenever they need it.
  • We do this by listening to the people we serve and acting on what we hear, creating the solutions they need.
  • We do this, and we do so much moreâ€¦
  • We have a mission-driven culture of purpose and passion that makes a positive difference in the world. Our team is 100% remote and distributed between Portugal and Brazil.
  • Esolidar has served over 90,000 people in 4+ countries and companies like TAP Air Portugal, Rock in Rio, Accor Hotels, and Tetley.
The role

To help us on our mission, we are looking for an ESG (environmental, social, and governance) Specialist to join our growing team. Youâ€™ll collaborate with all departments, defining and implementing an ESG strategy in-house and as a consultant for our customers, using our platform and proposing changes and improvements when required.
The work is challenging but incredibly rewarding. This is a chance to make your mark and seize the growing opportunity for ESG technology.

What youâ€™ll do
  • Lead, promote and execute esolidar strategic, core ESG, and sustainability initiatives;
  • Lead efforts on applying for certifications, sustainability reporting based on indexes (B Corp, Carbon Disclosure Project (CDP), Greenhouse Gas Protocol (GHG), Global Reporting Initiative (GRI), International <IR> Framework, ISE, etc.), and greenhouse gas emissions inventory;
  • Support internal communication to make key functions and employees aware of esolidar sustainability initiatives and how different functions support the achievement of esolidar sustainability goals;
  • Maintain consistency in quantitative and qualitative sustainability information across various communication platforms;
  • Gather the relevant information to build ESG case studies;
  • Perform analysis of external assessment scores which will support the improvement of existing and drive the development of new sustainability programs from existing customers;
  • Develop with customers systematic frameworks and processes that analyze ESG risks and opportunities;
  • Project manage customer requests on materiality assessments, sustainability reporting, and 3rd party assurance;
  • Transform the ESG information into ready-to-use templates for the tech team;
  • Research sustainability trends and always keep updated with ESG market best practices.
Who you are
  • You live within the Brazilian or Portuguese timezone (UTC-3 to UTC+1);
  • Minimum of a bachelorâ€™s degree education;
  • At least 3 years of experience in an ESG, CSR, or Sustainability focused role;
  • Fluent in English and Portuguese;
  • Demonstrated success in ESG KPI development, goal setting, measurement, tracking, and reporting;
  • Experience creating successful partnerships with cross-functional internal and external teams for implementation of cohesive integrated ESG programs, best practices;
  • Demonstrated success with cohesive analysis and assessment of impact using both key quantitative and qualitative data points;
  • Background on leading sustainability reporting and/ or strategy development projects in an in-house role, or in a consulting role;
  • Strong business acumen and knowledge of ESG goal setting, disclosures, best-in-class sustainability practices;
  • Ability to build relationships, both internally and externally;
  • Critical thinking, resilient, can-do attitude, and solution-driven;
  • Passionate about learning new skills.

It will be a nice plus if you have

  • Experience with Excel, and managing databases or other data repositories, likewise, some experience in development with programming languages;
  • Other European languages will be a plus.
Rewards & Benefits
  • Flexible working hours (we trust you to work enough hours to do your job well, at times that suit you and your team);
  • Flexible working from home policy. We are 100% fully remote, and we will stay that way for the foreseeable future (we also have a physical office space in Braga, Portugal, if you prefer to work that way);
  • Flexible sick leave policy (take the time you need to feel better or take care of a sick family member within reason);
  • 22 days of paid vacation + 4 days off for Carnival, Christmas, New Yearâ€™s Eve, and your birthday (because we love what we do, but we also love vacation!);
  • Matching donations program (when you donate money to a charity or equivalent, esolidar will make a matching gift to that charity on your behalf);
  • A day for you to give back to the community (You can take one day off every year to volunteer for a charitable organization of your choice. Sometimes, we schedule these as a team);
  • Meal Allowance;
  • Career progression (we are currently building open and detailed career ladders);
  • All equipment you may need. To build a great product, you need great gear (weâ€™ll provide you with a computer, a monitor, accessories, and any software you need to do your job as well as possible);
  • A stimulating work environment and a chance to change the world (literally!).

Personal compensation management (you choose your benefits ğŸ‰)

  • Health and dental insurance;
  • Technology spending in Apple and other tech stores;
  • Childcare vouchers;
  • Transport Card;
  • Professional Training;
  • Retirement & Investment;
  • Health & Well-being;
  • Senior Expenses;
  • School Expenses;
  • Exclusive discounts + tax-free products and discounted services from the likes of Apple, Holmes Place, etcâ€¦
A few points in closingâ€¦
  • Weâ€™re constantly evaluating our perks to enhance them for our team, and we tend to provide some extras that are not listed here;
  • Some of the perks listed above will be considered taxable income depending on how you use them and the tax laws aligned with where you reside.
Diversity and inclusion at esolidar

At esolidar, our mission is to improve lives through dependable and straightforward tools that help make a difference.
Weâ€™ve set an audacious goal: to make esolidar the most diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace on the planet.
We believe diversity drives innovation. So weâ€™re building a culture where difference is valued. We hire under equal opportunity, irrespective of gender, ethnicity, religion, belief, disability, sexual orientation, pregnancy, maternity, or background.
As part of our positive strategy, everyone has the opportunity to speak up and participate, grow and share ideas. We strive to be mindful by being aware of our surroundings, acknowledging the impact others have on us and our impact on them.

Be yourself. We like it that way.

description:
About the Role

Excellent teams begin with incredible people.

If you work in human resources, have experience in hiring developers, and are looking for a startup with global potential, you will like what we have for you.

As a tech recruiter, youâ€™re going to manage the hiring and onboarding process of new Crocters, help in teamsâ€™ technical and interpersonal development, and maintain supportive and motivating surroundings for everyone.

If you are looking for an opportunity to grow by facing constant challenges to improve your recruiting skills, this job is perfect for you.
As part of the job, you will:
  • Manage and enhance the talent acquisition process for technology job positions, as well as for the product, sales, and marketing openings
  • Understand the requirements of each opening and define (jointly with the team) what are the requisites, technical profile, behavioral, and differences of an ideal candidate, assuring diversity and inclusion practices
  • Screening candidates by filtering people with culture fit and who meet the needs of the job
  • Perform and follow up the selection process of openings, beginning in the hunting process until the adaptation phase after the onboarding
  • Identify opportunities for strengthening the company culture to assure that principles are disseminated to all Crocters
  • Analyze and improve hiring metrics and team performance.
What we seek:
  • Experience in recruitment for technological positions
  • Knowledge of multiple tech recruiting sources, such as GitHub, StackOverflow, developer communities, etc
  • Strong communication, organizational, and negotiation skills
  • Excellent communication and argumentation abilities for defending your ideas and communicating with all of our teams
  • Intermediate English is a minimum requisite.
What we consider a preferable skill:
  • Experience in startups and in recruiting business job openings
  • Experience in managing 1:1â€™s
  • Know-how in other segments of human resources, such as personnel departments.
What we offer:
  • Competitive salary
  • Outsourced work
  • Freedom to work from anywhere
  • Flexibility in working hours
  • Growth opportunity in a startup with potential global scale
  • Collaborative surroundings and welcome new ideas
  • Work side-by-side with the founders and an incredible team.

title: Engenheiro de Software

description:
We are a platform that empowers companies to create unique communication experiences for their customers.

Our Humanz create tools that raise the level of communication experience between companies and their end customers and maximize their results. If youâ€™ve ever changed an invoice payment date through a chatbot or interacted with a support channel on social media, weâ€™re behind the solution.

In 2021, we were the first SaaS company in Latin America to go public on Nasdaq. We are operating in several countries in Latin America, with more than ten thousand customers. We are GPTW and more than nine hundred Humanz around the world.

ZENVIA is growing fast, and we are always looking for professionals to bring new perspectives. Enthusiastic people who want to be part of this great digital transformation.

We want less strings and more connection, freedom and flexibility. Therefore, our work is 100% remote â€“ with home office assistance! Our way of being values and respects the individuality of each one, with autonomy to work and develop.

ZENVIA. By Humanz for Humans.

About the team you will work directly

Sirena is the solution that helps businesses get discovered, communicate, and drive growth in the new messaging age. We are part of Zenvia, the leading communications platform of LatinAmerica! We are a fully-remote company!

We adapt all our processes to allow all our team members to work from their homes.

Your challenges to make a difference in this team
  • Assist in the definition of development processes, architectures and methodologies that the equipment and applications will use
  • Investigate, design and create the decoupled components that make up Sirena as well as its accessory tools
  • Work together with our first level team in the integral development of the Sirena platform.
Humanz profile we are looking for
  • Knowledge of technologies and tools that speed up the coding and development process
  • Experience using continuous delivery, continuous integration and testing tools
  • Experience with agile methodologies
  • Proactivity
  • More than 2 years of experience developing Web Applications using JavaScript-based technologies (ReactJS, Redux, etc)
  • Demonstrable experience having worked in a medium / large size solution.
  • Knowledge in Development, Deploy and Maintenance of Web Applications Management of common patterns of development and design of Web Applications
  • Analytical skills and problem-solving attitude;
  • Great team player with the ability to work with minimal supervision.
  • English language
  • Experience with SQL and / or NoSQL Database engines (preferably MongoDB) (not exclusive)

Itâ€™s a plus, but not mandatory ğŸ˜‰

  • Portuguese language
What makes us a Great Place to Work?
  • Flexibility in working hours
  • Remote work
  • Language Program
  • Partnership with Gympass!
  • Health insurance
  • Participation in results, because you helped to build them
  • Discounts at various educational institutions
  • Monthly meetings to exchange knowledge, practice languages and more (all virtual, but it feels like weâ€™re sitting next to each other)
  • Direct connection with colleagues from other countries
  • No dress code
  • Informal work environment, where colleagues share knowledge, collaborate and learn together
  • Transparency, open dialogue and security for everyone to be whoever they want are essential for us
  • Open structure: we love to give and receive feedback as we understand this is the best way to grow personally and professionally
  • Talent development and management programs so you can activate your full potential and design your career at ZENVIA
  • 40 USD for expenses
Come be a HUMANZ

For us, people are unique. A Humanz understands, respects and learns from differences and individualities, sets clear goals, enjoys the journey and delivers results as a single team. Here we seek to contribute to the whole, get out of our comfort zone. We make mistakes, make things right and learn together.

Â

title: Product Manager

description:
We are a platform that empowers companies to create unique communication experiences for their customers.

Our Humanz create tools that raise the level of communication experience between companies and their end customers and maximize their results. If youâ€™ve ever changed an invoice payment date through a chatbot or interacted with a support channel on social media, weâ€™re behind the solution.

In 2021, we were the first SaaS company in Latin America to go public on Nasdaq. We are operating in several countries in Latin America, with more than ten thousand customers. We are GPTW and more than nine hundred Humanz around the world.

ZENVIA is growing fast, and we are always looking for professionals to bring new perspectives. Enthusiastic people who want to be part of this great digital transformation.

We want less strings and more connection, freedom and flexibility. Therefore, our work is 100% remote â€“ with home office assistance! Our way of being values and respects the individuality of each one, with autonomy to work and develop.

ZENVIA. By Humanz for Humans.

About the Product Designer position:

We are looking for a hybrid Designer between UX and UI, creative, willing to solve problems, a professional who doesnâ€™t like to be in the comfort zone, bringing solid knowledge of the end-to-end design process, good communication, and problem-solving skills.

You will work very collaboratively with a multidisciplinary team of engineers, product managers, researchers, and data analysts while balancing the contribution and strategy of marketing and business partners to deliver exceptional experiences and solutions for our users and partners.

Purpose and challenge abound. Do you want to help build this story, impact the lives of millions of users worldwide and you do well with the requirements below? Then this is for you! ğŸ™‚

Your challenges to make a difference in this team
  • Understand the product strategy and what our users need to create solid and consistent proposals;
  • Participate in product development, from discovery to implementation;
  • Build a connection with other areas of business, data, and marketing at all levels of the organization, influencing business decisions that advocate user-centric design;
  • Partnership with Product Managers and Developers;
  • Helping to create and strengthen the design culture focusing on the user and delivering results, sharing ideas, evolving processes and vision;
  • Inspire fellow product designers by creating a high standard of quality design work;
  • Develop and execute structured presentations, sharing new ideas or progress and how the team is solving a problem;
  • Conduct dynamics and co-creation workshops with different areas and consumers;
  • Perform A/B testing and other experiments;
  • Creation of processes for the UX team to improve delivery quality;
  • Prototyping, hypothesis validation, and interest in data analysis;
  • Creation of flows, wireframes, interfaces, and application of dynamics with the Squad and Business Area.
  • All our vacancies are for everyone. Here people are unique, we respect and value differences.
Humanz profile we are looking for
  • Experience in conducting and monitoring user surveys, hypothesis validation, and data analysis;
  • Strong design skills and ability to guide other designers, raising the level of design;
  • A mix of UI, UX, and Research;
  • Experience in designing responsive web interfaces and applications;
  • Expertise in design and prototyping tools;
  • Rational of scaling everything you do, be it research, design system, or processes;
  • Great communication and time management skills;
  • Analytical and insightful look, which seeks to understand contexts, data, and have empathy to put yourself in the shoes of others;
  • Willingness to absorb and share knowledge to contribute to the teamâ€™s maturity;
  • Ability to work well in an agile and highly accelerated environment, being able to organize, communicate and execute what you believe, impacting results.
What makes us a Great Place to Work?
  • Flexibility in working hours
  • Remote work with monthly home office support (permanent) and partnership with Beer & Coffee for co-workings throughout Brazil
  • Language Program
  • Partnership with Gympass and Yoga class live online!
  • Full package of benefits: food and meal tickets, health and dental plan, life insurance
  • Participation in results, because you helped to build them
  • Discounts at various educational institutions
  • Monthly meetings to exchange knowledge, practice languages and more (all virtual, but it feels like weâ€™re sitting next to each other)
  • Direct connection with colleagues from other countries
  • No dress code
  • Informal work environment, where colleagues share knowledge, collaborate and learn together
  • Transparency, open dialogue and security for everyone to be whoever they want are essential for us
  • Open structure: we love to give and receive feedback as we understand this is the best way to grow personally and professionally
  • Talent development and management programs so you can activate your full potential and design your career at ZENVIA
Come be a HUMANZ

For us, people are unique. A Humanz understands, respects and learns from differences and individualities, sets clear goals, enjoys the journey and delivers results as a single team. Here we seek to contribute to the whole, get out of our comfort zone. We make mistakes, make things right and learn together.

We believe that it is necessary to dive deep and break down barriers. It is necessary to be curious, understand the problems and address the root causes. We want professionals who challenge the status quo, get rid of excuses and make things happen, because we give space for people to unlock their true potential to achieve their best performance, leading the necessary change, with responsibility and systems thinking.

At ZENVIA, everyone is respected, regardless of race, religion, gender and gender identity, sexual orientation, nationality, disability or age. We operate with autonomy and freedom with responsibility. ğŸ˜Š

Within the ZENVIA World you will be able to develop and apply your main skills while maintaining your authenticity. All this with a lot of humor, lightness, empathy and, above all, respect for others.

Â

About the Role


Excellent design begins with incredible people.
If you are an organized and creative person concerned about keeping your design scalable and looking for a startup with global potential to work remotely, you will like what we have for you.
As a Motion Designer, you will help our customers understand our platform more easily through animations and videos. Youâ€™ll also get the opportunity to learn about UI/UX and put your know-how into practice to further enhance the experience on our website, blog, and social media through motion.

Our stack

Figma

Excalidraw

GitHub

Know-how and clarity on UX/UI good practices

Figma, Adobe XD, or similar apps experience.

Competitive salary
Outsourced work
Freedom to work anywhere
Flexible working hours
Growth opportunity in a startup with potential global scale

Work side-by-side with the founders and an incredible team
Freedom to work and contribute to open source projects

description:
About the Role

Excellent teams begin with incredible people.
If you work in human resources, have experience in hiring developers, and are looking for a startup with global potential, you will like what we have for you.
As a tech recruiter, youâ€™re going to manage the hiring and onboarding process of new Crocters, help in teamsâ€™ technical and interpersonal development, and maintain supportive and motivating surroundings for everyone.
If you are looking for an opportunity to grow by facing constant challenges to improve your recruiting skills, this job is perfect for you.

As part of the job, you will:


Manage and enhance the talent acquisition process for technology job positions, as well as for the product, sales, and marketing openings


Understand the requirements of each opening and define (jointly with the team) what are the requisites, technical profile, behavioral, and differences of an ideal candidate, assuring diversity and inclusion practices


Screening candidates by filtering people with culture fit and who meet the needs of the job


Perform and follow up the selection process of openings, beginning in the hunting process until the adaptation phase after the onboarding


Identify opportunities for strengthening the company culture to assure that principles are disseminated to all Crocters


Analyze and improve hiring metrics and team performance.


What we seek:


Experience in recruitment for technological positions


Knowledge of multiple tech recruiting sources, such as GitHub, StackOverflow, developer communities, etc


Strong communication, organizational, and negotiation skills


Excellent communication and argumentation abilities for defending your ideas and communicating with all of our teams


Intermediate English is a minimum requisite.


What we consider a preferable skill:


Experience in startups and in recruiting business job openings


Experience in managing 1:1â€™s


Know-how in other segments of human resources, such as personnel departments.


What we offer:


Competitive salary


Outsourced work


Freedom to work from anywhere


Flexibility in working hours


Growth opportunity in a startup with potential global scale


Collaborative surroundings and welcome new ideas


Work side-by-side with the founders and an incredible team.

description: About the RoleExcellent teams begin with incredible people.If you work in human resources, have experience in hiring developers, and are looking for a startup with global potential, you will like what we have for you.As a tech recruiter, youâ€™re going to manage the hiring and onboarding process of new Crocters, help in teamsâ€™ technical and interpersonal development, and maintain supportive and motivating surroundings for everyone.If you are looking for an opportunity to grow by facing constant challenges to improve your recruiting skills, this job is perfect for you.As part of the job, you will:Manage and enhance the talent acquisition process for technology job positions, as well as for the product, sales, and marketing openingsUnderstand the requirements of each opening and define (jointly with the team) what are the requisites, technical profile, behavioral, and differences of an ideal candidate, assuring diversity and inclusion practicesScreening candidates by filtering people with culture fit and who meet the needs of the jobPerform and follow up the selection process of openings, beginning in the hunting process until the adaptation phase after the onboardingIdentify opportunities for strengthening the company culture to assure that principles are disseminated to all CroctersAnalyze and improve hiring metrics and team performance.What we seek:Experience in recruitment for technological positionsKnowledge of multiple tech recruiting sources, such as GitHub, StackOverflow, developer communities, etcStrong communication, organizational, and negotiation skillsExcellent communication and argumentation abilities for defending your ideas and communicating with all of our teamsIntermediate English is a minimum requisite.What we consider a preferable skill:Experience in startups and in recruiting business job openingsExperience in managing 1:1â€™sKnow-how in other segments of human resources, such as personnel departments.What we offer:Competitive salaryOutsourced workFreedom to work from anywhereFlexibility in working hoursGrowth opportunity in a startup with potential global scaleCollaborative surroundings and welcome new ideasWork side-by-side with the founders and an incredible team.Â Candidatar-se para esta vaga

description: DESCRIÃ‡ÃƒO DA VAGAOur client is a Norwegian multinational company and the product you are going to be working on helps farmers to maximize their carbon crop yield.You will work with a multicultural team with different talents, experiences and various skill sets to find creative and inventive solutions and help you grow your career.
